Package hw3.squarelotron

Interface SquarelotronMethods

All Known Implementing Classes:
LargeSquarelotron, SmallSquarelotron, Squarelotron
public interface SquarelotronMethods
Interface defining operations applicable to a Squarelotron.
Since:
22/03/24
Version:
1.0
Author:
Pyrros Bratskas

  • Method Details

    • numbers

      int[] numbers()
      Returns the numbers of the Squarelotron in a 1D array format.
      Returns:
      An array containing the elements of the Squarelotron.

    • upsideDownFlip

      Squarelotron upsideDownFlip(String ring)
      Performs an upside-down flip of the specified ring.
      Parameters:
      ring - Specifies the ring to flip ("outer" or "inner").
      Returns:
      A new Squarelotron instance reflecting the flip.

    • leftRightFlip

      Squarelotron leftRightFlip(String ring)
      Performs a left-right flip of the specified ring.
      Parameters:
      ring - Specifies the ring to flip ("outer" or "inner").
      Returns:
      A new Squarelotron instance reflecting the flip.

    • inverseDiagonalFlip

      Squarelotron inverseDiagonalFlip(String ring)
      Performs an inverse diagonal flip of the specified ring.
      Parameters:
      ring - Specifies the ring to flip ("outer" or "inner").
      Returns:
      A new Squarelotron instance reflecting the flip.

    • mainDiagonalFlip

      Squarelotron mainDiagonalFlip(String ring)
      Performs a main diagonal flip of the specified ring.
      Parameters:
      ring - Specifies the ring to flip ("outer" or "inner").
      Returns:
      A new Squarelotron instance reflecting the flip.

    • sideFlip

      Squarelotron sideFlip(String side)
      Performs a side flip based on the specified side.
      Parameters:
      side - Specifies the side to flip ("top", "bottom", "left", "right").
      Returns:
      A new Squarelotron instance reflecting the flip.

    • rotateRight

      void rotateRight(int numberOfTurns)
      Rotates the Squarelotron 90 degrees to the right for the specified number of turns. A negative value indicates a rotation to the left.
      Parameters:
      numberOfTurns - The number of times the Squarelotron should be rotated.

    • equals

      boolean equals(Object object)
      Checks if the current Squarelotron is equal to another object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      object - The object to compare against.
      Returns:
      true if the objects are equal, false otherwise.

    • toString

      String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Squarelotron.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string representation.
